nodes.text: Tak Base was a base on Talay. At some point, the base sent a distress call to the Rebel Alliance leading them to send a HWK-290 light freighter to the base to see what could have wiped it out so quickly.

Tak Base was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity as an event in the scenario of Star Wars: Dark Forces, a first-person shooter video game developed by LucasArts and released in 1995. In that game, the Base was destroyed by Dark Troopers, and the HWK-290 that responded was the Moldy Crow, operated by Kyle Katarn. These elements were reintroduced to the new canon but not associated with each other.
